name: Vegan Peanut Butter Cookies
description: These vegan peanut butter cookies with chocolate chips are easy to make, full of peanut butter flavor, and sooo delicious! And they're ready in just 15 minutes! We can't get enough of them!
recipeIngredient: 2  flax eggs  ((2 tablespoons flaxseed meal + 5 tablespoons of water))

recipeInstructions.text: Make the flax egg. Combine two tablespoons of flaxseed meal with five tablespoons of water and let it sit for 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Make the flax egg. Combine two tablespoons of flaxseed meal with five tablespoons of water and let it sit for 5 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: In the meantime, make the oat flour. You can skip this step if you use store-bought oat flour. Otherwise place the oats into a food processor or high speed blender and process until you have a fine flour.
recipeInstructions.name: In the meantime, make the oat flour. You can skip this step if you use store-bought oat flour. Otherwise place the oats into a food processor or high speed blender and process until you have a fine flour.

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all ingredients in a bowl and stir well.
recipeInstructions.name: Combine all ingredients in a bowl and stir well.

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 350 °F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper and form 12 cookies out of the cookie dough using an ice cream scoop or a tablespoon.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat the oven to 350 °F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper and form 12 cookies out of the cookie dough using an ice cream scoop or a tablespoon.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake the cookies for 8-10 minutes. Mine took 10 minutes. Then let them cool on the baking sheet for about 10 minutes before you move them to a cooling rack. Don't pick them up to early or they might stick to the parchment paper.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake the cookies for 8-10 minutes. Mine took 10 minutes. Then let them cool on the baking sheet for about 10 minutes before you move them to a cooling rack. Don't pick them up to early or they might stick to the parchment paper.

keywords: how to make vegan peanut butter cookies, vegan peanut butter cookie recipe, vegan peanut butter cookies
